feed.title: Apx Community
feed.subtitle: Live feed of new stacks and package managers from the Apx Community.

entry.title: New Stack: fedora-php
entry.content:
• Base: docker.io/fedora:latest
  • Packages: php, php-cli
  • Package Manager: dnf
  • Builtin: No

entry.title: New Package Manager: apk
entry.content:
• Model: 2
  • Needs Sudo: Yes
  • Command Autoremove: apk
  • Command Clean: apk
  • Command Install: apk add
  • Command List: apk list
  • Command Purge: apk del
  • Command Remove: apk del
  • Command Search: apk search
  • Command Show: apk info
  • Command Update: apk update
  • Command Upgrade: apk upgrade --available
  • Builtin: Yes

entry.title: New Package Manager: pacman
entry.content:
• Model: 2
  • Needs Sudo: Yes
  • Command Autoremove: pacman -Qdtq
  • Command Clean: pacman -Sc
  • Command Install: pacman -S
  • Command List: pacman -Qe
  • Command Purge: pacman -Rns
  • Command Remove: pacman -R
  • Command Search: pacman -Ss
  • Command Show: pacman -Si
  • Command Update: pacman -Sy
  • Command Upgrade: pacman -Syu
  • Builtin: Yes

entry.title: New Package Manager: apt
entry.content:
• Model: 2
  • Needs Sudo: Yes
  • Command Autoremove: apt autoremove
  • Command Clean: apt clean
  • Command Install: apt install
  • Command List: apt list
  • Command Purge: apt purge
  • Command Remove: apt remove
  • Command Search: apt search
  • Command Show: apt show
  • Command Update: apt update
  • Command Upgrade: apt upgrade
  • Builtin: No

entry.title: New Package Manager: dnf
entry.content:
• Model: 2
  • Needs Sudo: Yes
  • Command Autoremove: dnf autoremove
  • Command Clean: dnf clean
  • Command Install: dnf install
  • Command List: dnf list
  • Command Purge: dnf remove
  • Command Remove: dnf remove
  • Command Search: dnf search
  • Command Show: dnf info
  • Command Update: dnf upgrade --refresh
  • Command Upgrade: dnf upgrade
  • Builtin: Yes

entry.title: New Package Manager: zypper
entry.content:
• Model: 2
  • Needs Sudo: Yes
  • Command Autoremove: zypper
  • Command Clean: zypper clean
  • Command Install: zypper install
  • Command List: zypper pa --installed-only
  • Command Purge: zypper remove
  • Command Remove: zypper remove
  • Command Search: zypper search
  • Command Show: zypper info
  • Command Update: zypper dup
  • Command Upgrade: zypper dup
  • Builtin: Yes
